overview: Three stories of the erotic and the esoteric.  A janitor at a wax museum cares deeply for the figures he watches, especially Cleopatra.  An author writes about a gorgeous femme fatale who does a slow strip and then performs fellatio on the hero.  A hooker who finds an opal ring on the street and is transformed into the mistress of a wealthy man, whose son's bride she is going to be the next day!
title: Erotic Zones 2
